content:
icious Mockery: Use this unique cantrip to deal damage and give enemies disadvantage on their next attack roll. Healing Word: Prepare this spell for its versatility, as it's a bonus action, can be used at range, and can revive fallen allies. Choose Subclass Based on Party Needs: College of Lore for spellcasting, College of Valour or College of Swords for martial capabilities. Delay Multiclassing: For new players, it's recommended not to multiclass until after reaching level 6.
